Vigilance, reach
[i]Exalt's Right Hand[/i] – Whenever Robin and your commander attack the same player, you draw two cards, then Robin deals X damage to target creature defending player controls, where X is the number of cards in your hand.
[i]Radiant Mastery[/i] – {T}: Add {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}. Whenever you cast a spell or activate an ability using this mana, for each different colored mana symbol in that spell or abilities cost, other creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
